data.text: This is a message that Yahweh our God gave to me, Obadiah, about the Edom people-group.
And Yahweh says this to the people of Edom:
Your capital city is high in the rocky cliffs,
And I tell you that even if you had wings and could fly higher than eagles fly,
When thieves break into someone’s house during the night,
Everything that is valuable will be taken away.
All ◄your allies/nations who promised to help you► will turn against you,
I, Yahweh, declare that at the time that I destroy Edom,
The soldiers from Teman town will become terrified;
You acted cruel in a cruel way toward your relatives who are descendants of Jacob, the twin brother of your ancestor Esau.
Foreigners entered the gates of Jerusalem
You should not have ◄gloated/been happy► about the disaster that the Israelis were experiencing.
They are my people,
You should not have stood at crossroads
“There will soon be the time when I, Yahweh, will judge and punish all the nations.
My people in Jerusalem have been punished
But some people in Jerusalem will escape,
The descendants [MTY] of Jacob and his son Joseph will be like [MET] a fire,
The Israeli people who live in the southern desert are the ones who will capture Edom.
Those who were ◄exiled in/forced to go to► Babylon will return to their land
The army of Jerusalem will attack Edom and conquer it,
